name: Monkey D. Luffy
text: Activate: Main You may trash this character: Reveal the top card of your life, if the card is a 5 cost (Monkey D. Luffy) card, you may play it. If you play it, up to 1 of your leaders gets +2000 Power until the end of your opponent's turn.
